Today‚Äôs @VetAffairsDems joint subcommittee hearing is a reminder of the critical importance of the VA‚Äôs IT infrastructure. The VA must get its IT modernization initiatives on track so our veterans can access the timely, high-quality health care and benefits they‚Äôve earned.

The U.S. Postal Service needs reform. Small businesses, seniors, and veterans have been hobbled by delays, and the outdated benefits structure threatens financial ruin for USPS. This is unacceptable! The Postal Service Reform Act will strengthen the Postal Service for the future.

Climate change is intensifying existing health threats and creating new ones. I spoke with @HealthNewsIll to discuss how my Climate and Health Protection Act and Protecting Moms and Babies Against Climate Act will address the extreme health concerns linked to climate change.

How is funding from the American Rescue Plan benefiting our communities? The funding is creating jobs in Sycamore by replacing a water main to improve fire flow for emergency responders. That means better emergency response and a thriving economy.

The right to vote is foundational to our democracy - full stop. 

That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs essential Congress works to protect it and ensure every state is held accountable to do the same. Your vote should be counted no matter what zip code you live in.

Every person should have access to the ballot box; it‚Äôs foundational to our democracy. Critical legislation shouldn't be derailed by the filibuster. 

The Senate must recognize the urgency of this moment and pass the John R. Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.

We have come so far since I was a brand-new Member of Congress and the youngest Black woman ever elected, and I‚Äôve enjoyed every step of the journey. I‚Äôm excited to head into 2022 ready to serve the 14th District!

I was so excited when @POTUS signed my Protecting Moms Who Served Act into law! This is the first @BMHCaucus #Momnibus bill to be signed into law and the 8th of my bills to be enacted. My bill ensures veterans receive the world-class maternity care they‚Äôve earned. https://t.co/aOqovsNDAM

In 2021, I came ready to represent your voices and deliver results. I had my first #Momnibus bill signed into law and introduced 17 bills ‚Äî I'm extremely proud of what we accomplished together. Take a look at some of the major wins:

We need to put money in the pockets of working families, not corporations. I‚Äôm urging my colleagues in the Senate to pass the #BuildBackBetter Act, so our kids can have resources to thrive in the future.‚ÄØ‚ÄØLearn how the Child Tax Credit benefits one parent in our community: https://t.co/vPSkjSXru1
American seniors should not pay 3, 4, or 10 times what people in other countries pay for the same prescription drugs. It‚Äôs time we give Medicare the ability to negotiate #LowerDrugCosts.
More than 13.6 million Americans have signed up for coverage during this open enrollment period -- an all-time high! Thanks to my Health Care Affordability Act, coverage is more affordable than ever.

Every American deserves access to health care. But for too many families, quality, affordable health care remains out of reach. I‚Äôve introduced the Health Care Affordability Act to lower out-of-pocket premium costs & bring affordable coverage within reach of millions more people.
Be like Kevin this holiday season - get your COVID-19 vaccine and booster! https://t.co/fWzFNXFngE

I know everyone is busy with the holiday season but don‚Äôt forget about my favorite season‚Äîopen enrollment‚Äîwhich lasts until Jan 15th this year! There‚Äôs still time to shop for a health care plan that fits within your family‚Äôs budget. Head to https://t.co/R1x7y78PiK to sign up!

We have a historic opportunity to lower out-of-pocket health care costs by expanding advanced premium tax credits, closing the Medicaid coverage gap, & cutting drug prices through Medicare negotiation. We can't #BuildBackBetter if Americans don't have access to care.

https://t.co/y5K3DB8g1w

Today, millions of lead service water lines are still in use around the nation, including in schools and childcare facilities. The #BuildBackBetter Act invests $10 billion in lead pipe replacement to help keep our kids safe, and I‚Äôm proud to support it.

Free and accessible Pre-K will save families in our community thousands each year!  

That extra $ in families‚Äô pockets goes a long way toward expenses like snow boots, museum trips, art supplies, & more. It also means kids are set up to thrive in and out of the classroom.

Another #ChildTaxCredit payment is hitting bank accounts today  ‚Äì helping families breathe easier ahead of the holidays. By passing the #BuildBackBetter Act, we have a chance to extend these tax cuts. Hear how that will personally change one mother‚Äôs life: https://t.co/o0zfRux91A

During @VP‚Äôs Maternal Health Day of Action, I had a chance to sit down with 11-time Olympic medalist @allysonfelix to discuss her childbirth story and why she advocates for improved maternal health. Stay tuned for more‚Ä¶ https://t.co/0YjjmLAk20
